title: Benjamin J. Grigor — CV
text:
Accounting student with a Data Science cluster. Experience in internal audit, analytics, and process improvement.

benjamingrigor@gmail.com · 469-486-4627 · LinkedIn



Apr 2023 – Dec 2025 Bachelor of Science in Accounting
Brigham Young University–Idaho, Rexburg, ID - GPA: 3.65 - Relevant coursework: Intermediate Financial Accounting II, Income Taxation II, Spreadsheet Analysis, Audit - Cluster in Data Science: SQL, Power BI, Tableau, Python
Sep 2019 – May 2021 Associate of Science
Collin College, Frisco, TX - GPA: 3.84



Jan 2025 – Apr 2025 Internal Auditor Intern
Globe Life Inc. (GLI), McKinney, TX - Reviewed prior internal audit reports to help develop the Risk Control Matrix and audit scope - Communicated past findings with the audit team to identify efficiencies and process improvements - Created and presented a Power BI report on audit hours; trained a colleague and received follow-up requests from the Divisional VP - Assisted Deloitte’s audit of GLI’s cash account using SQL queries to test existence and accuracy of customer policies
Nov 2022 – Apr 2023 Ramp Agent
Airport Terminal Services, Calgary International Airport, Calgary, AB, Canada - Executed pre-flight checklists and directed aircraft in a fast-paced, high-pressure environment - Loaded and unloaded five or more aircraft daily, ensuring proper weight distribution and safety compliance
Feb 2022 – Oct 2022 Carpenter
Bear Mountain Construction, Calgary, AB, Canada - Framed residential structures with attention to detail and precise measurements - Ensured compliance with building codes and safety standards
Oct 2019 – Sep 2021 Delivery Specialist
Papa John’s Pizza, Flower Mound, TX



Aug 2017 – Jul 2019 Leader & Church Ambassador
The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints, Irvine, CA - Gained fluency in Spanish through immersive volunteer service - Supervised, trained, and guided other ambassadors in policies and procedures - Developed resilience, persistence, and time-management skills in demanding environments
